MS.S: This module provides cmdlets for working with Azure Cosmos DB databases, collections, documents, attachments, offers, users, permissions, triggers, stored procedures and user defined functions.

## [4.7.0] - 2023-01-29_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Added `-ConnectionString` parameter to `New-CosmosDbContext` - Fixes [Issue #426](https://github.com/PlagueHO/CosmosDB/issues/426)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixed spelling errors in documentation.
This module provides cmdlets for working with Azure Cosmos DB databases, collections, documents, attachments, offers, users, permissions, triggers, stored procedures and user defined functions.

## [4.7.0] - 2023-01-29_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Added `-ConnectionString` parameter to `New-CosmosDbContext` - Fixes [Issue #426](https://github.com/PlagueHO/CosmosDB/issues/426)._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixed spelling errors in documentation.
